Reviews.Title: Very Decent
Reviews.Author: puddytat
Reviews.Content: Problem is today alot of things are going HD and this DVR is not able to  handle those.  However I do believe that some new HD cameras can still spit out Standard Def so this product still  has some life in it still.  I like the D1 capability...easy menu etc... a well made and backed up product... Swann has been doing this for a long time and  you want someone with experience and a warranty centre of some kind.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Sharke
Reviews.Content: My old Swann DVR died and I need just the DVR so I could still use the existing cameras. This one hooked up perfectly and was working in less than 15 min. I downloaded the android mobile phone app and it works just fine. Best of all for $10. shipping Amazon had it at my house the next day!!

Reviews.Title: I'm experienced, but found the setup easy and it's worked reliably for many months...
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Derfler "Do Good!"
Reviews.Content: As good as or better than other competing products I have used.  A good value.  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the Price
Reviews.Author: Donna I Weekley
Reviews.Content: This DVR works well, is much better than the two previous brands we have owned. Easy to use however we do not use the Smartphone View portion of the product so I cannot say if that is as easy as setup and use. Would recommend this DVR
